com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence

Interface TypeResolutionPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTypeResolutionPolicy

    public interface TypeResolutionPolicy

    This interface provides runtime resolution of data types for the purpose of persistence in the ORM.

    Version:
    1.0 05/17/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • isValidPrimaryKey

        boolean isValidPrimaryKey(java.lang.reflect.Field pkField,
                        java.io.Serializable id)
        Indicates if the given ID is a valid value for the given primary key Field. Precondition assumes pkField is in fact a primary key.
        Parameters:
        pkField - the primary key Field
        id - the primary key value to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid primary key value, false if not

      • isDomainModel

        boolean isDomainModel(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Indicates if the given Class is a registered domain model for this application.
        Parameters:
        c - the Class to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a domain model, false if not

      • isDomainProxy

        boolean isDomainProxy(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Indicates if the given Class is a proxy for a domain model.
        Parameters:
        c - the Class to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a domain proxy, false if not
